experience: You and Sriram both know Phil Bienert, Raj Mukherjee, and 24 others

Owns All things Data across all of Cambia & its portfolio companies.Sets vision  for Data Engineering (on-premises & Cloud teams), Data Governance & Enterprise BI teams and responsible for driving the execution of enterprise-wide data strategy and data management innovation, and shaping Cambia’s core data and consumer experience strategies. Responsibilities also include to ensure Cambia is an industry leader in leveraging data as an asset and a means to engage more intimately with members, consumers, and partners across all portfolio companies and solutions.

Along with Data Governance, I also manage Enterprise Business Intelligence group at Cambia. This group consists of 40+ employees, consisting of BI developers, BI consultants, Technical Program Managers, Enterprise data analysts, System analysts, BI director and managers.Built an engineering team to build out data pipeline & also tools that needed for data analytics team.Responsible for budgeting, resource management, tool purchase decisions (Buy/Build) for Enterprise-wide Data Governance/Business Intelligence at Cambia.Built an Enterprise BI strategy to be used across the whole org.Restructured BI team to have more technology focus and to build self-service tools and automated data extraction.Current focus is on building BI platform to serve not just Cambia, but also other partners.Also working on fixing data pipeline issues, to support batch and real-time data flow across a AWS pipeline. Leading a cross-group effort to make our current pipeline faster and more stable.Introduced Engineering Culture manifesto at BI team to build a sustainable, engineering focused team.Sought after thought leader across the org to solve audit findings and for engineering focused consulting.Worked on various Data Science projects with Data Science and Advanced Analytics group which resulted in various cost-savings and improved customer experience at Cambia.

Established and created an enterprise data governance implementation roadmap including strategic priorities for development of information-based capabilities. Rolled out an enterprise wide data governance framework, with a focus on improvement of data quality and the protection of sensitive data through modifications to organization behavior policies and standards, principles, governance metrics, processes, related tools and data architectureBuilt a team of Enterprise Data Governance, consisting of Data Engineers and Data Governance Analysts from ground up, to support Data Governance activities, Enterprise wide.Developed & maintained an inventory of enterprise information maps, including authoritative systems, ownersResponsible for data governance budget and resource management decisions. Also responsible for buy/build decisions to bring appropriate tools at Cambia.Delivered and socialized Data Governance Policies & Standards and worked with other internal partners (Privacy, Legal & InfoSec) to enforce policies and standards across the org.Built Data Quality System to profile and monitor data from on-premises and in Amazon Cloud to educate and improve data quality across the org. Data Quality system is the home grown service which replaced commercial data quality tool and is ready for use by other Cambia companies.Set up and chaired data governance committee and created data stewardship program to socialize data governance best practices in the areas of data quality, meta data & master data management, access controls, privacy, security and information lifecycle management.Actively participated in change management workgroups to bring change management and best practices for data management at Cambia.Introduced Data Governance training for all current and new employees to educate all employees about importance of clean, high quality and timely data within Cambia.

Managing the Big Data/API test team, responsible for data quality (precision/recall) of Big Data conflation pipeline, public records linkage to people, social record (facebook, linkedin, google+, zoominfo) linkage to public records, criminal/civil record linkage to public records & identifying relatives & associates of people.Also responsible for functionality and performance of Intelius APIs that expose all the public/social  records to external partners.

Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer at Cambia Health Solutions
June 10, 2014, Ang managed Sriram directly

Sriram is one of the most experienced test lead and manager I have ever had the pleasure to work with. Back in the days when I was an individual contributor, we collaborated on many data science projects. He was always coming up with right test plan with excellent test automation. His test cases and metrics always provided me with a tremendous amounts of insights of how to improve many of the machine learning models that I built. Sriram is also very dedicated and always deliver. When it comes to releasing our major product, he can work until midnight to get things done. During his service at inome, he also made hires that were great additions to the whole team. Besides all these, Sriram is a thought leader and I learned a lot from his ideas, suggestions and many business questions he asked about back in inome. I would love to work with Sriram again in the future.

Ty Lam
Member of Technical Staff at Pure Storage
August 22, 2012, Ty worked with Sriram in different groups

As a test manager at Expedia, Sriram ran a tight ship and regularly achieved zero defect status on his team's releases. This was no small task because of the changes that had to be tested for the complicated air domain. Additionally, he was a thought-leader amongst his peers and spearheaded various efforts across the organization. He is extremely hands on and always made the right calls, with the big picture intact. We worked together on a air ticketing platform project (v1 release). He managed the test team very skillfuly, updated the stake holders promptly and pulled week enders as needed to deliver this project ontime. Devs/PM's/onsite & offshore SDET's were highly motivated and delivered the project on time, with very high quality. This would not have been possible, without Sriram's leadership. Sriram was a pleasure to work with and I would enjoy working with him again.

Lin Chen
Director of Engineering, Artificial Intelligence at Cambia Health Solutions
September 10, 2014, Lin worked with Sriram in the same group

Lin has the rare combination of research mindset and strong engineering skills. He was our go-to guy for a lot of our engineering issues, eventhough he was a senior scientist working in the science team. Lin is also very helpful, always trying to unblock others with excellent problem solving skills. Lin knows how to breakdown bigger tasks into smaller chunks and attack them. Our big data pipeline was written in python and within 2 months and after 1000's of lines of code, Lin ported it to Java. This was a badly needed task that needed to be accomplished and without Lin, we would not have achieved it. I would definitely work with Lin, if I get another chance. If you are reading this, wanting to hire Lin, please do so quickly, as you might not have a long time frame to hire Lin.

Ang Sun
Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer at Cambia Health Solutions
June 17, 2014, Sriram reported directly to Ang

Ang has the rare combination of technical smarts with excellent people management skills. He is extremely practical and believes in releasing V1 of features quickly and then go on improvements over time. His knowledge in NLP & machine learning helped him to deliver some core features of data pipeline in a less than a week. He is also very quick in fixing bugs, turning them around in the same day. Under his leadership, we released numerous data builds with high quality. He stays in trenches, staying very late and motivates and helps bring out the best of every team member. We did hadoop version upgrade of our cluster under his leadership, inspite of tight deadlines on our data builds. He also helped put Intelius/inome in the big data field, by conducting big data bellevue meetup events and presenting in numerous big data conferences. Ang is a true visionary and people like him are extremely rare. I would love to work him again, if I get a chance in future.
